availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: J. G. P. Hooe (Jefferson County, Kentucky, prov govt rep)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, prov govt rep. Virginia native. Owner of china store in Louisville in 1860. Employed James B. Lee as a clerk in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. X
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 5, p. 178
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. X
